JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Vicuras are looking for new massage substitutes
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to become part of our fantastic therapist team?
To help us deliver massage treatments to companies in Denmark, Vicuras are currently seeking new substitutes to our companies around Zealand. 

ABOUT THE POSITION
Vicuras has a clear ambition of being the industry’s most attractive place to work, and to reach that, we need new massage therapists to join us and our existing 100 fantastic therapists. As a substitute at Vicuras, you will be assigned to various companies around Zealand (with a max. of one hour transport), with guaranteed hours and working days. 

A job with Vicuras as a substitute means:

  • Fixed salary and attractive employment conditions
  • Always paid for the full shift
  • Opportunity to combine with an independent clinic
  • 6-8 annual paid education courses which can be used to maintain or reach RAB.
  • We take care of all administrative tasks as well as all equipment (massage tables, linens, oils, etc.). You just need to show up for your shift.
  • A community and network with social gatherings and focus on the needs of the individual employee.

WHO ARE YOU?

  • You can be a massage therapist, physiotherapist, zone therapist or have hold other relevant backgrounds - as long as you are capable and willing to deliver massage treatments.
  • You are flexible, punctual, and reliable.
  • You have a car and are willing to transport yourself up to one hour to each company (max.)
  • You want to be a part of a young company where there is room for growth and a strong focus on each colleague.
  • Having experience with company massage is an advantage.
  • You can speak either English, Danish or both.

DOES THIS SOUND LIKE SOMETHING FOR YOU?
If you want to be part of our dynamic workplace, please send your application, CV, and attach other relevant documents via following link:

https://vicuras.dk/soeg-job-som-behandler/

You are also very welcome to contact us by telephone at 22 21 20 60 if you have any questions.

We hope to hear from you, and hope that you want to become part of our team.
